thread.title: How hotels can fight their corner if the magic of meta is waning!
thread.title_full: How hotels can fight their corner if the magic of meta is waning! | Travel Industry News & Conferences - EyeforTravel

author: Jeff Weibel
title: How hotels can fight their corner if the magic of meta is waning!
text: Another way to drive direct bookings is to capitalize on the relationships that your guests have with their friends and families. If you can get them to recommend your hotel in a scalable and repeatable way, your hotel will benefit from that "word-of-mouth" marketing. That is what we are working on at Flip.to .
